gt_text: '10:00 AM — Construire des LLMs éthiques — Dr. Mariah Singh — Salle 203', '11:15 AM — L’avenir des puces quantiques — Prof. Anton Yu — Scène principale', '1:00 PM — Présentations éclair : IA + Art', '2:30 PM — Table ronde : Open Source vs Modèles propriétaires', '3:45 PM — Hall C : Présentation de startups (snacks offerts !)', 'Séance fermée : Sur invitation uniquement — Salle 305', 'Stand de mentorat — Ouvert de 9h30 à 16h00', 'Wi-Fi gratuit : Connectez-vous avec votre badge', 'Rappel : Envoyez vos retours via l’appli avant 17h', 'Afterparty de ce soir : Toit terrasse, niveau 4 à 19h'.
juding_criteria:
Here is a bullet list of required elements:

*   Hallway (technology conference venue style)
*   Large printed schedule wall
*   Laminated A3 posters (covering the wall)
*   Columns of posters
*   Color-coded posters (by track)
*   Straight-pinned posters
*   Slightly skewed posters
*   French session titles (on posters)
*   French speaker names (on posters)
*   French room numbers/locations (on posters)
*   French times (on posters, e.g., "10h00")
*   French general announcements (on posters, e.g., for WiFi, afterparty, mentorship)
*   Conference signage typography (for all French text)
*   Man (reading schedule wall)
*   Lanyard badge (on man)
*   Tote bag (held by man)
*   Woman (beside man)
*   Smartphone (held by woman)
*   Woman taking photo of a poster
*   Man (seen from behind and slightly to the side)
*   Woman (seen from behind and slightly to the side)
*   Open hallway (leading deeper into venue, forming part of the composition)
